definitions.definition: The eighteenth book of the New Testament of the Bible , the epistle of Saint Paul to a fellow Christian called Philemon.
A male given name from Ancient Greek .
A surname transferred from the given name .

main_definition: The eighteenth book of the New Testament of the Bible , the epistle of Saint Paul to a fellow Christian called Philemon.
secondary_definitions: A male given name from Ancient Greek .
A surname transferred from the given name .
